modName: Suri ENB - High Performance Natural ENB for CoT
summary: This is a high performance ENB meant to be used alongside with CoT. It is inspired by both, PROJECT ENB and RealLike ENB.
descriptionHtml:
A couple of months ago, a friend of mine was blown away after installing Project ENB because he hadn't tried any ENB before, so he was basically freaking out (we all went nuts the first time we tried an ENB) . The only problem he had was low framerate (he barely had 15fps)

I told him - "I will make an ENB for you which looks similar to Project ENB but that performs way better". So what I did was, I took RealLike ENB's enbseries.ini file and I replaced most of the values with the ones found in Project ENB's .ini file. 

The result was pretty good so I sent him the files, he tried the ENB, and even though it didn't look as crisp and sharp as Project ENB, his performance went from 15fps to 30-40fps (due to using the old 0.113 binaries used by RealLike ENB)

After tweaking it slightly, we decided that I would release it under the name "Suri ENB" (because his name is Suri)

The default version includes Depth of Field and Anti Aliasing + Anisotropic Filtering, the "More Performance Version" doesn't have Depth of Field nor Anti-Aliasing


MAKE SURE "bFloatPointRenderTarget=" is set to 1  <(bFloatPointRenderTarget=1)> in your Skyrimprefs.ini file (found in Documents/My Games/Skyrim)

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS FOUND WITHIN THE .RAR FILE

THIS ENB PRESET REQUIRES [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]CLIMATES OF TAMRIEL[/url]

DOWNLOAD THE ENB BINARIES [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm]HERE[/url]

INSPIRED BY [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20781/?]PROJECT ENB[/url] (by Bronze316) and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22056/?]REALLIKE ENB[/url] (by [b]s3b3k87)[/b]




I WILL ADD MORE DESCRIPTION WHEN I HAVE TIME (I'M STILL LEARNING HOW TO SAVE MY SCHOOL BOOKS AS PDF FILES INSIDE MY MIND SO I DON'T HAVE TO STUDY FOR MY EXAMS)
author: nirnhogg AKA slamm98
